original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhim savidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruhanti

original: “yatheva mayaṁ sapajāpatikā nāvāya kīḷāma, evamevime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya nāvāya kīḷantī”ti.
analyzed: yathā iva mayam sa pajāpatikāḥ nāvāya kīḷāma evam eva ime samaṇāḥ sakyaputtiyāḥ bhikkhunīhi saddhim savidhāya nāvāya kīḷanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhim savidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruhissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhathā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave bhikkhunīhi saddhim savidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruhatha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhissatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe moghapurisāḥ bhikkhunīhi saddhim savidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruhissatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruheyya, uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhim savidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruheyya uddhaṅgāminim vā adhogāminim vā pācittiyanti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca sāketā sāvatthiṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyaḥ ca sāketā sāvatthim addhāna magga ppaṭipannāḥ honti

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo te bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ te bhikkhū etat avocuḥ
mayam pi ayyehi saddhim uttarissāma ati

original: “Na, bhaginī, kappati bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhituṁ;
analyzed: na bhaginī kappati bhikkhuniyā saddhim savidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruhitu

original: tumhe vā paṭhamaṁ uttaratha mayaṁ vā uttarissāmā”ti.
analyzed: tumhe vā paṭhamam uttaratha mayam vā uttarissāma ati

original: Atha kho tāsaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ pacchā uttarantīnaṁ corā acchindiṁsu ca dūsesuñca.
analyzed: atha kho tāsam bhikkhunīnam pacchā uttarantīnam corāḥ ca dūsesuṃ ca

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ sāvatthim gantvā bhikkhunīnam etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tiriyaṁ taraṇāya bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave tiriyam taraṇāya bhikkhuniyā saddhim savidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruhitu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruheyya uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, aññatra tiriyaṁ taraṇāya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhim savidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruheyya uddhaṅgāminim vā adhogāminim vā aññatra tiriyam taraṇāya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: “abhiruhāma, bhagini, abhiruhāmāyya; abhiruhāmāyya, abhiruhāma, bhagini; ajja vā hiyyo vā pare vā abhiruhāmā”ti saṁvidahati āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: abhiruhāma bhagini abhiruhāma ayya abhiruhāma ayya abhiruhāma bhagini ajja vā hiyyas vā pare vā abhiruhāma ati sa vidahati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Bhikkhuniyā abhiruḷhe bhikkhu abhiruhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyā abhiruḷhe bhikkhu abhiruhati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Bhikkhumhi abhiruḷhe bhikkhunī abhiruhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: bhikkhumhi abhiruḷhe bhikkhunī abhiruhati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Kukkuṭasampāte gāme, gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: kukkuṭa sampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agāmake araññe, aḍḍhayojane aḍḍhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: agāmake araññe aḍḍha yojane aḍḍha yojane āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Saṁvidahite saṁvidahitasaññī ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, aññatra tiriyaṁ taraṇāya, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: savidahite savidahita saññī ekam nāvam abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminim vā adhogāminim vā aññatra tiriyam taraṇāya āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Saṁvidahite vematiko ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, aññatra tiriyaṁ taraṇāya, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: sa vidahite vematikaḥ ekam nāvam abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminim vā adhogāminim vā aññatra tiriyam taraṇāya āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Saṁvidahite asaṁvidahitasaññī ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminiṁ vā adhogāminiṁ vā, aññatra tiriyaṁ taraṇāya, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: savidahite a savidahita saññī ekam nāvam abhiruhati uddhaṅgāminim vā adhogāminim vā aññatra tiriyam taraṇāya āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Bhikkhu saṁvidahati, bhikkhunī na saṁvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu savidahati bhikkhunī na savidahati āpatti dukkaṭassa
a savidahite savidahita saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
a sa vidahite vematikaḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa
a savidahite a savidahita saññī anāpatti
